examples.example: 我们应该从不同的角度去看待问题，这样也许会有新的发现和收获。

translate.english: We should view problems from different perspectives, and maybe there will be new discoveries and gains in this way.

examples.example: 从不同的角度去欣赏这幅画，会有别样的美感和韵味。

translate.english: Appreciating this painting from different perspectives will have a different kind of beauty and charm.

examples.example: 我们要学会从多个角度去思考事情，这样才能更全面地理解和解决问题。

translate.english: We should learn to think about things from multiple perspectives, so that we can understand and solve problems more comprehensively.
